name: ImageTest
description: Unit tests for various image generation functionalities provided by the Image class.

test_cases.name: bmp
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded BMP image.

test_cases.name: gif
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded GIF image.

test_cases.name: png
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded PNG image.

test_cases.name: jpg
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded JPG image.

test_cases.name: jpeg
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded JPEG image.

test_cases.name: svg
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded SVG image.

test_cases.name: tiff
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded TIFF image.

test_cases.name: base64
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded image with various types.

test_cases.name: defaultBuilder
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded image using the default builder.

test_cases.name: customBase64builder
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded GIF image using a custom builder.

test_cases.name: tinyBase64builder
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded tiny PNG image using a custom builder.

test_cases.name: largeBase64builder
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of a base64-encoded large BMP image using a custom builder.

test_cases.name: shouldErrorOnIllegalType
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when an illegal image type is provided.

test_cases.name: shouldErrorOnNegativeWidth
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when a negative width is provided.

test_cases.name: shouldErrorOnZeroWidth
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when a zero width is provided.

test_cases.name: shouldErrorOnNegativeHeight
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when a negative height is provided.

test_cases.name: shouldErrorOnZeroHeight
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when a zero height is provided.
